attributes.title: Great App !!! MAGA !!!
attributes.review: Clean and functional app.  Wondering if the profile photo function works, but otherwise this app is HIGH ENERGY.  NO BRAKES !!!

attributes.title: America for Trump
attributes.review: Very nice app . Easy to follow . Makes me feel connected to the details of this election .
